article:
'Conformer' is a clear plastic shell fitted after Eye Removal operation if the
final artificial eye is not available at the time of surgery to hold the shape
of the eye socket and allow the eye lids to blink over the shell without rubbing
the suture line. The conformer shell holds the shape ready for the artificial
eye. The conformer shell will be worn for six to eight weeks after surgery. Some
ocularists will make a temporary artificial eye which can be worn as the
conformer shell.
